subject: Re: Speech-Dispatcher vi CVS?
body:
>>>>> "H" == Hermann   writes:

    H> Hi, want to test the very latest SD, because I observe crashes of

    H> installed cvs and checked the manual, but I cannot figure out how
    H> to download a certain program; the manual answers questions I
    H> never asked. So can someone please point me to the right
    H> direction? Hermann
